statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT id, comment_text FROM user_feedback WHERE id = 5;
SELECT feedback_text FROM user_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, comment_text FROM user_feedback WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, user_id, timestamp FROM user_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT comment_id, user_id, content_id, comment_text FROM comments ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE content_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 5 AND comment_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT content_name AS name, improvement_description AS description FROM content_improvement;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT c.comment_text, u.user_id FROM comments c JOIN user_feedback u ON c.feedback_id = u.feedback_id;
SELECT content_name, improvement_description FROM content_improvement ORDER BY improvement_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Content ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM User WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT content_id, title, content_type FROM Content WHERE content_type = 'article';
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT u.username, c.title, uf.feedback_text FROM User u JOIN UserFeedback uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN Content c ON uf.feedback_id = c.content_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(c.comment_id) AS total_comments FROM User u JOIN Comments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
SELECT u.username, c.title, com.comment_text FROM User u JOIN Content c ON u.user_id = c.content_id JOIN Comments com ON c.content_id = com.content_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, user_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT content_id, user_id, comment FROM feedback WHERE content_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 5 AND content_id = 20;
SELECT title, url FROM content WHERE id = 15;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content_id, title FROM content WHERE title LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, COUNT(id) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id, content_id HAVING total_likes > 10;
SELECT user_id, content_id, comment FROM comments WHERE LENGTH(comment) > 50 AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
